body.name: Skywin Travel Laundry Detergent 10 ml - 8 Pack Effective Travel Detergent Packets for Sink Washing - Lightweight Travel Laundry Soap, International Travel Must Haves Laundry Essentials
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 hrs 40 mins
features: [ Convenient Laundry Soap Travel Size ] - Each travel laundry soap for sink washing pack contains 8 travel-sized 10 ml detergent pouches, with a dimension of 4.7 x 4.3 x 1.8 inches, perfect for on-the-go use during international travel.

[ Lightweight and Space-Saving Travel Size Detergent ] - The compact design of this travel-size laundry detergent packets allows you to pack multiple pouches easily without taking up valuable luggage space.

[ Effective Cleaning Travel Soap ] - Despite its small size, this travel detergent laundry provides powerful cleaning performance, effectively removing stains and odors from your clothes during your laundry on the go. This good-smelling laundry detergent is applicable to general fabrics such as cotton, hemp, synthetic fiber and blended fabrics

[ Travel Size Compliant ] - With this sink laundry detergent travel packets, You don't have to worry about meeting the airport compliance on bringing liquid items as part of your travel necessities for flying with 3.4 ounces (100ml) travel size soap or smaller to either a carry-on bag or check-in baggage. This is for ultimate long-flight travel must-haves!

[ Eco-friendly and Easy to Use Travel Laundry Kit ] - The travel washing detergent is formulated to be environmentally friendly, ensuring your laundry routine remains sustainable even during your travels. This travel laundry soap is easy to use, simply mix the packet in water, wash your garments, and hang them dry. For Hand Washing, Use 1 packet for 2-3 garments and 3-4 packets for a full load of laundry in the washing machine.
body.description: Introducing Skywin Travel Laundry Detergent 10 ml your ultimate companion for international travel must-haves! Say goodbye to laundry woes on the road and embrace the convenience of this travel laundry soap laundry essentials.Each pack of this laundry detergent travel size contains travel-sized 10 ml detergent pouches, providing the perfect amount for a single load of laundry. This compact size of laundry detergent for travel is designed with travelers in mind, allowing you to easily slip them into any bag or luggage without taking up precious space. With this laundry detergent small, No more worrying about carrying bulky detergent bottles!Despite its small size as travel supplies, don't underestimate the cleaning power of Skywin Travel Laundry Detergent. It boasts a highly effective formula that packs a punch against stains and odors, ensuring your clothes come out fresh and clean after every wash. Whether you're exploring bustling cities, trekking in the wilderness, or simply on a weekend getaway, your clothes will stay in top-notch condition.Traveling internationally can bring about various challenges, including navigating different laundry facilities. With Skywin Travel Laundry Detergent, you can wash your clothes in a sink, bathtub, or laundry room with ease. No need to rely on questionable hotel laundry services or search frantically for detergent while abroad. Surely laundry travel needs must-haves for international travel!Safety and convenience are our top priorities. Rest assured that Skywin Travel Laundry Detergent is compliant, complying with airport security guidelines. Travel stress-free knowing you won't encounter any issues at security checkpoints.Moreover, we care about the environment. Our eco-friendly formula ensures that your laundry routine remains sustainable during your travels. You can clean your clothes effectively while minimizing your ecological footprint.
